General.Name: Encanto Potash Corp
General.Description: Encanto Potash Corp. engages in the exploration and development of potash properties in the province of Saskatchewan, Canada. The company owns interests is the Muskowekwan First Nation Potash Mine Project covering an area of approximately 61,114 acres located to the north of Regina, Saskatchewan. Encanto Potash Corp. was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
